actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to municipal deposits.
short_title: Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2001

summary.text: Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to mandate that deposits of an in-State municipal depositor at an insured depository institution be insured in their totality.

titles.title: Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2001
A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to municipal deposits.
